description: This file is a Python module that sets up a logging interface by importing an external Log class and providing a factory function 'Create' to instantiate log objects with configurable options.

methods.name: Create(name, verbose = False, show_warnings = True, show_doc_issues = False)
methods.description: Factory function that creates and returns an ExternalLog.Log object with specified configuration options.

ctags.name: Create
ctags.pattern: /^def Create(name, verbose = False, show_warnings = True, show_doc_issues = False):$/
ctags.signature: (name, verbose = False, show_warnings = True, show_doc_issues = False)
